title: Item set creations [HELP]

embed.description: This is "Item set fault-HD 720p" by Lord Sesshomaru on Vimeo, the home for high quality videos and the people who love them.

body:
Riot made a post about the new client here:
http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/ask-riot-the-future-of-the-client-update/

And in it they discussed a way to make Item sets work, _(thanks Riot it made my day!)_ 
I had previously tried to make an Item set for Aurelion Sol for the new client, by making it in the old client, but couldn't seem to get it to work.
Riot told us this morning how to get around that, and now my Aurelion Sol one works in the new client _(at least in a custom, haven't tried pvp yet)_.

So now the test _(Aurelion Sol)_ works, i thought id make ones for the rest of my champs _(because the new recommended items on some champs are so weird)_, but as you see in the video, it wouldn't let me drag the items into the new custom set. My Aurelion Sol one is still there, but i cant seem to create a new one. 

This wasn't the case a month or so ago when I tried to make the Sol one. You could easily drag items across.

Does anyone know what I'm doing wrong?
Is there a bug? or am I just being me, and forgetting some basic step?

thanks
